title: ASUS SDRW-08D2S-U/W/G/ACI/AS Computer International Direct External Slim White 8X DVD-RW - Stylish Diamond Cut Design External Slim DVD-RW Optical Drive
description: SDRW-08D2S-U LITE is an external slim DVD writer capable of 8X speeds. The lattice-like appearance of the drive is inspired by diamonds, making the product unique from every angle. Additional features include USB 2.0 and the E-Green Engine for the best optical storage available.
